code: import{useState}from'react';import{DashboardFrame}from'./dashboard_frame';import{ClientManager}from'./subApps/cm/cm.js';import{DirectMessage}from'./subApps/dm.js';import{AppointmentManager}from'./subApps/am.js';import{GroupManager}from'./subApps/gm.js';import{SettingsForm}from'../setup/settings.js';import{getUserData}from'../database/database.js';/* KEY: 1 = Cleint Manager, 2 = Direct Message, 3 = Appointment Manager, 4 = Group Manager */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export function RenderDashboard(props){const[currentPage,setPage]=useState(0);function handleNavButtonClick(i){setPage(i);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DashboardFrame,{userData:props.userData,displayNum:currentPage,navButtonClicked:i=>handleNavButtonClick(i),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DirectContent,{userData:props.userData,currentPage:currentPage,changeUserDataState:props.changeUserDataState})})});}function DirectContent(props){if(props.currentPage==1){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ClientManager,{userData:props.userData});}else if(props.currentPage==2){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DirectMessage,{userData:props.userData});}else if(props.currentPage==3){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppointmentManager,{userData:props.userData});}else if(props.currentPage==4){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GroupManager,{userData:props.userData});}else if(props.currentPage==5){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SettingsForm,{userData:props.userData,changeUserDataState:props.changeUserDataState});}}
